label: contentTypeCode
comment: A code specifying the content type of this product characteristic.
The code specifying the content type of this XHE payload instance.
The code specifying the content type of this metric characteristic.
The code specifying the content type of this sustainability characteristic.

domainIncludes.comment: A prominent attribute or aspect of a metric (a standard of measurement).
An individual set of transmitted data in an XHE (Exchange Header Envelope).
A prominent attribute or aspect of a product.
A prominent attribute or aspect of an object, such as recyclability of a product, which can meet customer needs without compromising the ability of future generations to meet their own needs.
